verbs.description: Donald Trump ’s decision to [V: rip] [ARG1: children] [ARG2: from the arms of immigrant parents] [ARGM-LOC: at the U.S./Mexico border] has been met with nearly universal condemnation—“this is a moral and legal abomination , ” wrote one conservative columnist — so of course , because ...
